sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button';
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal';

function CreateEvent() {
  const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false);

  const handleCloseModal = () => setShowModal(false);
  const handleShowModal = () => setShowModal(true);

  return (
    <>
      <Button variant="primary" onClick={handleShowModal}>
        Open Modal
      </Button>

      <Modal show={showModal} onHide={handleCloseModal}>
        <Modal.Header closeButton>
          <Modal.Title>Create Event</Modal.Title>
        </Modal.Header>
        <Modal.Body>
          <Form>
            <fieldset disabled>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label htmlFor="disabledTextInput">Event Name</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control id="disabledTextInput" placeholder="Event Name" />
              </Form.Group>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label htmlFor="disabledTextInput">Number of Participants</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control id="disabledTextInput" placeholder="Number of Participants" />
              </Form.Group>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label htmlFor="disabledTextInput">Materials Required</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control id="disabledTextInput" placeholder="Materials Required" />
              </Form.Group>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label htmlFor="disabledTextInput">Estimated Cost</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control id="disabledTextInput" placeholder="Estimated Cost" />
              </Form.Group>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label htmlFor="disabledTextInput">Venue</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control id="disabledTextInput" placeholder="Venue" />
              </Form.Group>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label htmlFor="disabledTextInput">Time</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control id="disabledTextInput" placeholder="Time" />
              </Form.Group>
            </fieldset>
          </Form>
        </Modal.Body>
        <Modal.Footer>
          <Button variant="secondary" onClick={handleCloseModal}>
            Close
          </Button>
          <Button variant="primary" onClick={handleCloseModal}>
            Save Changes
          </Button>
        </Modal.Footer>
      </Modal>
    </>
  );
}

export default CreateEvent;
